name: fabulist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who writes fables (= short stories that tell a general truth or are only partly based on fact): Aesop is probably the best known fabulist in literature. Classical historians and fabulists have described all-female tribes.
disapproving someone who tells lies: The politician was accused of being a fabulist by his opponents. It's an indictment of our political culture that such a fabulist can be voted into such a powerful post.
More examplesFewer examplesNumerous fabulists invented stories about enemies of the state.I soon realized that he was a total fabulist and so I treated every word he said with scepticism.
